sentences.en: A film adhesive for bonding aluminum honeycomb core materials was develope.
sentences.cn: 研制了一种铝蜂窝芯材拼接胶膜.

sentences.en: Bees store honey in the cells of the honeycomb.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂把蜂蜜储藏在蜂巢里.

sentences.en: But now the honeycomb board manufacturers often control bad quality problems often.
sentences.cn: 但现在蜂窝纸板生产厂家往往因控制不好经常出现质量问题.

sentences.en: CELL Bees store honey in the cells of a honeycomb.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂将花蜜储存在蜂巢的各个小蜂窝中.

sentences.en: Composite honeycomb panel is a new kind of environmental material.
sentences.cn: 蜂窝复合板是一种新型环保材料.

sentences.en: Graphene is a flat sheet of carbon just one atom thick – with the carbon atoms arranged in a honeycomb lattice.
sentences.cn: 石墨烯是一种只有单原子厚度的碳原子平面层——碳原子按蜂窝状晶格排列。

sentences.en: Honeycomb sandwich has become an important material in designing radomes instruction.
sentences.cn: 蜂窝夹层结构已成为雷达罩结构设计中广泛应用的重要材料.

sentences.en: I didn't want to end up back in those honeycomb cells.
sentences.cn: 我不想在那些蜂巢里耗尽终生.

sentences.en: On the other hand, Thompson’s explanation of surface tension ignores the bees, which painstakingly build the honeycomb, and possess capabilities that are not yet fully understood.
sentences.cn: 而另一方面，汤姆逊的表面张力论忽视了蜜蜂费力建造蜂巢的过程，而且蜜蜂拥有至今仍未弄清的许多能力。

sentences.en: Please pile these honeycomb coal briquettes in the corner.
sentences.cn: 请把这些蜂窝煤堆在墙角.

sentences.en: The compound micropore honeycomb plate paper core uses AA high - strengthcorrugated core.
sentences.cn: 复合微孔蜂窝板芯纸采用AA级高强瓦楞芯.

sentences.en: The courtyard, dating back 400 million years of fossil coral honeycomb.
sentences.cn: 院内有距今4亿多年的珊瑚蜂窝化石.

sentences.en: The honeycomb regenerator's structure optimizing software is developed.
sentences.cn: 并开发了蜂窝体蓄热室结构优化的软件.

sentences.en: The mechanical performance of corrugated paperboard and honeycomb board were reviewed.
sentences.cn: 本文回顾了国内外瓦楞纸板和蜂窝纸板力学性能的研究状况.

sentences.en: The utility model relates to a new honeycomb briquet moulding machine.
sentences.cn: 本实用新型是一种新型的蜂窝煤成型机.

sentences.en: Thermal shock resistance of honeycomb ceramics was 600 ℃.
sentences.cn: 蜂窝陶瓷的抗热震性能达600℃.

sentences.en: We demonstrate that the QSH phase present in the honeycomb lattice loses its robustness as the occupancy of extra lattice sites is allowed.
sentences.cn: 我们证明在蜂窝格点下, 量子自旋霍尔相在额外格点的占据被允许的情况下将失去它的健壮性.

sentences.en: Why are honeycomb cells in bee hives hexagon shaped?
sentences.cn: 为什么蜂箱里的蜂巢是六边形的 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 变成蜂巢状；充满（honeycomb的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a structure made by  bees  , which consists of many six-sided cells in which honey is stored
